from django.db import transaction
from rest_framework import serializers
from rest_framework.exceptions import APIException
import shortuuid
from rest_framework.utils import model_meta

from client.models.company import Company, CompanyFile, CompanyReviewLog, CompanyType, S1UserCompanyMap
from consts.common import DATE_FORMAT
from utils.chuanglan_services import OcrRecognition



[文档]class CompanyCreateSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    id = serializers.IntegerField(read_only=True)
    company_type_id = serializers.IntegerField(write_only=True)
    county_id = serializers.IntegerField(allow_null=True, write_only=True)
    management_detail_address = serializers.CharField(allow_null=True, allow_blank=True, write_only=True)
    establish_at = serializers.DateField(allow_null=True, format=DATE_FORMAT, write_only=True)
    registered_capital = serializers.FloatField(allow_null=True, write_only=True)
    paid_in_capital = serializers.FloatField(allow_null=True, write_only=True)
    desc = serializers.CharField(allow_null=True, allow_blank=True, write_only=True)
    management_range = serializers.CharField(allow_null=True, allow_blank=True, write_only=True)
    registered_address = serializers.CharField(allow_null=True, allow_blank=True, write_only=True)
    credit_code = serializers.CharField(write_only=True)
    company_type = serializers.CharField(source="company_type.name", read_only=True)
    # TODO(Rey): 这个字段可以删掉, 创建公司之后因为没有创建公司审批日志, 所以返回的都是None
    company_status = serializers.CharField(source="companyreviewlog.status", read_only=True, default="")
    uid = serializers.CharField(read_only=True)
    bank_account_number = serializers.CharField()
    bank_name = serializers.CharField()
    bank_open_sub_branch = serializers.CharField()
    bank_city_id = serializers.IntegerField()
    business_license_url = serializers.URLField()
    legal_person_positive_url = serializers.URLField(write_only=True)
    legal_person_unpositive_url = serializers.URLField(write_only=True)
    legal_person_id_card = serializers.CharField()
    legal_person_name = serializers.CharField()


[文档]    def create(self, validated_data):
        """
        重写创建函数
        :param validated_data:
        :return:
        """
        if Company.objects.filter(credit_code=validated_data.get("credit_code")).exists():
            raise APIException("该企业已经存在！")
        # 企业四要素校验 TODO 测试时再打开
        # ocr = OcrRecognition()
        # if not ocr.business_four_auth(
        #     validated_data.get("name"), validated_data.get("legal_person_name"),
        #     validated_data.get("credit_code"), validated_data.get("legal_person_id_card"),
        # ):
        #     raise APIException("企业四要素校验失败，请核查")

        with transaction.atomic():
            legal_person_positive_url = validated_data.pop("legal_person_positive_url")
            legal_person_unpositive_url = validated_data.pop("legal_person_unpositive_url")
            instance = Company.objects.create(
                s1_user_id=self.context.get("user_id"),
                uid=shortuuid.uuid(),
                **validated_data
            )
            # 创建用户与企业的关联关系
            S1UserCompanyMap.objects.create(
                company=instance,
                s1_user_id=instance.s1_user_id
            )
            # 创建企业附件
            CompanyFile.objects.create(
                company=instance,
                legal_person_positive_url=legal_person_positive_url,
                legal_person_unpositive_url=legal_person_unpositive_url
            )
            # 创建企业审核数据，当前状态是待申请打款
            CompanyReviewLog.objects.create(
                company_id=instance.id,
                status="apply_pay"
            )
            return instance



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = Company
        fields = [
            "id", "company_type_id", "name",
            "credit_code", "establish_at",
            "registered_capital", "registered_address",

            "paid_in_capital", "desc", "management_range",
            "company_type", "company_status", "uid",
            "bank_account_number", "bank_name",
            "bank_open_sub_branch", "bank_city_id",
            "business_license_url", "legal_person_positive_url", "legal_person_unpositive_url",
            "legal_person_id_card", "legal_person_name"
        ]




[文档]class CompanyFileCreateSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    logo_url = serializers.URLField(source="company.logo_url", allow_null=True, allow_blank=True)

    legal_person_certificate = serializers.JSONField()
    authorized_by_operator = serializers.JSONField()
    special_industries_license = serializers.JSONField(allow_null=True)
    env_protection_approval = serializers.JSONField(allow_null=True)
    audit_report = serializers.JSONField(allow_null=True)
    financial_statements = serializers.JSONField(allow_null=True)
    constitution = serializers.JSONField(allow_null=True)
    company_id = serializers.IntegerField()


[文档]    def validate_legal_person_certificate(self, value):
        """legal_person_certificate字段中的url为正确格式

        :param _type_ value: 输入
        :return _type_: 经过url校验的输出
        """
        for obj in value:
            serializers.URLField().run_validation(data=obj.get('url', ''))
        return value



[文档]    def validate(self, attrs: dict):
        """校验json字段中的url为正确格式

        :param dict attrs: 输入
        :return _type_: 经过url校验的输出
        """
        fields = [
            'authorized_by_operator', 'special_industries_license',
            'env_protection_approval', 'audit_report',
            'financial_statements', 'constitution'
        ]
        for field in fields:
            values = attrs.get(field)
            if not values:
                continue
            for value in values:
                serializers.URLField().run_validation(data=value.get('url', ''))
        return attrs



[文档]    def create(self, validated_data):
        """
        重写创建逻辑
        @param validated_data:
        @return:
        """
        r_log = CompanyReviewLog.objects.filter(
            company_id=validated_data.get("company_id")
        ).only("status").first()
        if r_log.status != "un_upload":
            raise APIException(f"当前状态是:{r_log.get_status_display()}无法上传附件")
        with transaction.atomic():
            company = validated_data.pop("company")
            Company.objects.filter(pk=validated_data.get("company_id")).update(
                **company
            )
            # 更新企业附件数据
            instance = CompanyFile.objects.filter(
                company_id=validated_data.get("company_id")
            )
            instance.update(**validated_data)
            # 更新企业审核状态变成待审批
            CompanyReviewLog.objects.filter(
                company_id=validated_data.get("company_id")
            ).update(status="undo")

            return instance.first()



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CompanyFile
        fields = [
            "logo_url",
            "legal_person_certificate", "authorized_by_operator",
            "special_industries_license", "env_protection_approval", "audit_report", "financial_statements",
            "constitution", "company_id"
        ]

[文档]class CompanyRetrieveUpdateSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    id = serializers.IntegerField(read_only=True)
    company_type_id = serializers.IntegerField()
    county_id = serializers.IntegerField(allow_null=True)
    city_id = serializers.IntegerField(read_only=True, source="county.city.id")
    province_id = serializers.IntegerField(read_only=True, source="county.city.province.id")
    management_detail_address = serializers.CharField(allow_null=True, allow_blank=True)
    establish_at = serializers.DateField(allow_null=True, format=DATE_FORMAT)
    registered_capital = serializers.FloatField(allow_null=True)
    paid_in_capital = serializers.FloatField(allow_null=True, required=False)
    desc = serializers.CharField(allow_null=True, allow_blank=True)
    management_range = serializers.CharField(allow_null=True, allow_blank=True)
    registered_address = serializers.CharField(allow_null=True, allow_blank=True)
    business_license_url = serializers.CharField(read_only=True)
    logo_url = serializers.CharField(read_only=True)
    status = serializers.SerializerMethodField(read_only=True)
    opinion = serializers.SerializerMethodField(read_only=True)
    bank_account_number = serializers.CharField()
    bank_name = serializers.CharField()
    bank_open_sub_branch = serializers.CharField()
    bank_city_id = serializers.IntegerField()
    bank_province_id = serializers.IntegerField(read_only=True, source="bank_city.province.id")
    business_license_url = serializers.URLField()
    legal_person_positive_url = serializers.URLField(source="companyfile.legal_person_positive_url")
    legal_person_unpositive_url = serializers.URLField(source="companyfile.legal_person_unpositive_url")
    legal_person_id_card = serializers.CharField()
    legal_person_name = serializers.CharField()


[文档]    def get_opinion(self, instance: Company):
        """
        获取审批意见
        @param instance:
        @return:
        """
        if hasattr(instance, "companyreviewlog"):
            return instance.companyreviewlog.opinion
        return ""



[文档]    def get_status(self, instance: Company):
        """
        获取
        @param instance: 
        @return: 
        """
        if hasattr(instance, "companyreviewlog"):
            return instance.companyreviewlog.status
        return None



[文档]    def update(self, instance, validated_data):
        """
        更新逻辑
        @param instance:
        @param validated_data:
        @return:
        """
        # 校验企业四要素 TODO 测试时打开
        # ocr = OcrRecognition()
        # if not ocr.business_four_auth(
        #         validated_data.get("name"), validated_data.get("legal_person_name"),
        #         validated_data.get("credit_code"), validated_data.get("legal_person_id_card"),
        # ):
        #     raise APIException("企业四要素校验失败，请核查")
        # 获取企业文件
        company_file = validated_data.pop("companyfile")
        with transaction.atomic():
            # 更新企业基本信息
            info = model_meta.get_field_info(instance)
            m2m_fields = []
            for attr, value in validated_data.items():
                if attr in info.relations and info.relations[attr].to_many:
                    m2m_fields.append((attr, value))
                else:
                    setattr(instance, attr, value)
            instance.save()
            for attr, value in m2m_fields:
                field = getattr(instance, attr)
                field.set(value)
            # 更新企业附件
            CompanyFile.objects.filter(
                company=instance
            ).update(**company_file)
            # 更新企业审核数据，修改为 待申请打款
            CompanyReviewLog.objects.filter(
                company_id=instance.id
            ).update(status="apply_pay")
            return instance

        model = Company
        fields = [
            "id", "company_type_id", "name",
            "credit_code", "establish_at", "city_id", "province_id",

            "management_detail_address", "county_id",
            "paid_in_capital", "desc", "management_range",
            "logo_url", "business_license_url", "status", "opinion",
            "bank_account_number", "bank_name",
            "bank_open_sub_branch", "bank_city_id",
            "business_license_url",
            "legal_person_positive_url", "legal_person_unpositive_url",
            "legal_person_id_card", "legal_person_name", "bank_province_id"
        ]

[文档]    def validate_legal_person_certificate(self, value):
        """legal_person_certificate字段中的url为正确格式
        :param _type_ value: 输入
        :return _type_: 经过url校验的输出
        """
        for obj in value:
            serializers.URLField().run_validation(data=obj.get('url', ''))
        return value



[文档]    def validate(self, attrs: dict):
        """
        校验json字段中的url为正确格式
        :param dict attrs: 输入
        :return _type_: 经过url校验的输出
        """
        fields = [
            'authorized_by_operator', 'special_industries_license',
            'env_protection_approval', 'audit_report',
            'financial_statements', 'constitution'
        ]
        for field in fields:
            values = attrs.get(field)
            if not values:
                continue
            for value in values:
                serializers.URLField().run_validation(data=value.get('url', ''))
        return attrs



[文档]    def update(self, instance: CompanyFile, validated_data):
        """

        @param instance:
        @param validated_data:
        @return:
        """
        if instance.company.companyreviewlog.status != "un_upload":
            raise APIException(f"当前状态是:{instance.company.companyreviewlog.get_status_display()}无法更新附件")
        with transaction.atomic():
            # 更新企业信息
            company = validated_data.pop('company')
            Company.objects.filter(pk=instance.company_id).update(
                **company
            )
            # 更新企业修改的附件
            info = model_meta.get_field_info(instance)
            m2m_fields = []
            for attr, value in validated_data.items():
                if attr in info.relations and info.relations[attr].to_many:
                    m2m_fields.append((attr, value))
                else:
                    setattr(instance, attr, value)
            instance.save()
            for attr, value in m2m_fields:
                field = getattr(instance, attr)
                field.set(value)

            # 更新审批日志
            CompanyReviewLog.objects.filter(company_id=instance.company_id).update(status='undo')
            return instance



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CompanyFile
        fields = [
            "logo_url",  "legal_person_certificate",
            "authorized_by_operator",
            "special_industries_license", "env_protection_approval", "audit_report", "financial_statements",
            "constitution", "company_id"
        ]

[文档]    def get_company_type_name(self, obj):
        """
        获取企业类型名称
        @param obj:
        @return:
        """
        return obj.company_type.name



[文档]    def get_company_review_status(self, obj):
        """
        获取企业审核状态
        @param obj:
        @return:
        """
        company_review_status = obj.companyreviewlog.status if hasattr(obj, "companyreviewlog") else None
        return company_review_status
